body.name: Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker with Brew Strength Selector
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 55 mins.
features: Modern design with stainless steel accents
Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause stops cycle if you need a cup before brewing is finished
2-Hour Shut Off feature automatically turns off coffee maker, so you don't have to
Brew Strength Selector lets you choose your desired flavor intensity
body.description: The Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Programmable Automatic Coffee Maker brings style, taste, and functionality together to create a rich blend that you'll savor for years to come. It features plenty of programmable options, like Delay Brew for coffee when you want it, or Brew Strength Selector to dial in the perfect taste. It also features a removable filter basket that lifts out for easy filling and cleaning. As coffee brews and that heavenly aroma fills the air, you don't have to wait until the cycle finishes to savor a cup, thanks to the convenient Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause feature.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All the brewing features a coffee lover appreciates for the best-tasting coffee. Since 1970 the Mr. Coffee brand has been doing one thing and one thing only. ..brewing coffee. No one has served cup after delicious cup to more Americans than us. For us, bringing a rich coffee experience into your home is our top priority. Along with coffee makers, we are here to share everything coffee with you. Mr.Coffee 12 Cup Programmable Coffeemaker Style and function come together in this Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Programmable Coffeemaker with all the brewing features a coffee lover appreciates for the best-tasting coffee. Enlarged Showerhead to extract coffee's full flavor Brewing Pause 'n Serve with 2 Hour Auto Shut -off Fresh Brew Timer & Audible Ready Signal Brew Strength Selector Self Cleaning Cycle

We Know Taste Matters This model is designed for coffee enthusiasts looking for brew performance with more. Programmable features, along with added extras, make the most of brewing rich-tasting coffee!

Brew Strength Selector Pump up flavor to strong if you like it bolder tasting. Includes Water Filtraiton Removes up to 97 percent of Chlorine for better-tasting coffee as a result of the Mr. Coffee water filter and brewing process. Shower Technology Evenly saturates the grounds and extracts the fullest flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: I love this coffee pot! Coffee come out hot and stays hot. Brews quickly. Easy to use. Good quality for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Makes good strong coffee, is reliable and simple to use. I don’t need anything fancy because I don’t use their additional features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hot coffee!!! Delicious
reviews.reviewText: We have always had Mr Coffee products, this one didn't disappoint. The coffee flavor is great. It also comes with an internal filter, in case you have hard water which we do. The only thing I would improve is the lid attachment. We have found that it is not secure and will dislodge when carafe becomes less full. While pouring coffee, keep hands free of cup in case it dislodges. There is a possibility the remaining HOT coffee will scald your hand if you are holding you cup. regardless, very good coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to operate
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking, big jar. Easy to clean and fast brewing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We had previously had a Mr. Coffee maker. The newer design is somewhat more cumbersome to load the basket and is defiantly cheaper made. The coffee brewer leaks on to the hotplate when you remove the pot even after all brewing is complete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sending it back for a refund, very displeased since it had high reviews. Expect more from Mr. Coffee.While running just water through it after I first unboxed it, before making actual coffee, it had an extremely strong plastic smell, which I figured would go away as it got used, but I have seen other reviews suggesting it did not.I ran just water through three times, three pots that night, and it nearly overflowed twice. I fortunately caught it both times. What appeared to have happened is the basket was not set just exactly, perfectly right so the spring stayed “up” and the water could not drip down through the basket into the pot. Instead it filled up the basket. As a result, the basket nearly overflowed the hot water everywhere. I jostled the basket a little and it got itself set and the water poured through. I was a little concerned but I figured I could just double check the basket when I brew. User error, right? Wrong.I did double check the basket making coffee this morning, and somehow it still didn’t set right, or possibly got knocked off center when I closed the lid due to the design. But lo and behold, the basket overflowed hot coffee and grounds everywhere.Very poorly designed. There are plenty of other fine coffee pots on the market that don’t require someone to hover over them while a simple pot of coffee brews. I’ve never had to do that before. I’ll look for another simple Mr. Coffee pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Leaks if not just right!
reviews.reviewText: The basket leaks everywhere if not carafe is not placed perfectly! Seems like the spring it too strong for the removal while brewing feature, which makes the filter overflow. It made a huge mess on my counter three times already. I've taken the spring out now. I'll see how it does. Works wonderful otherwise. Fast brewing, good flavor, and easy to use.
